body: Importing inventory can really restrict cash flow if your overseas suppliers require payment at the time of shipment. With your money-generating items still in transit, finances can get a bit tight--UPS Capital Cargo Finance® can help. When you use our reliable freight services--ground, ocean, or air--we can advance funds against your inventory, letting you increase working capital, improve relationships with suppliers, and gain greater efficiencies in your supply chain.
title: How can I get working capital
